name: .NAAC File Extension
summary: Learn about .NAAC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An NAAC file is an audio file used by a Nintendo 3DS game developed by Namco. For example, Ace Combat: Assault Horizon Legacy and Taiko no Tatsujin: Don to Katsu no Jikuu Daibouken use NAAC files. Typically, NAAC files contain songs played in a game.

content: NAAC files are .AAC (Advanced Audio Coding) files that contain a Namco-specific file header. Modders and other gaming enthusiasts may encounter NAAC files while browsing a Namco-developed 3DS game's contents. (For example, some Namco-developed games' song directories contain NAAC files.)

instructions: You can open an NAAC file with vgmstream (multiplatform), to play the audio it contains. You can also play NAAC files with Foobar2000 or Nullsoft Winamp, after installing those programs' vgmstream plug-ins.
With the vgmstream plug-in installed, you can use Foobar2000 to convert NAAC files to .WAV and other formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
